title: International trade and development
text:
United Nations 
A/C.2/80/L.62
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
24 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-19240 (E)    241125 
*2519240* 
 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Second Committee 
Agenda item 16 (a) 
Macroeconomic policy questions: international trade 
and development 
 
 
 
 
 
Denmark:* amendment to draft resolution A/C.2/80/L.13/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 International trade and development 
 
 
 
Delete the twenty-first preambular paragraph and operative paragraphs 35, 38 
and 39. 
 
 
 
* On behalf of the States Members of the United Nations that are members of the European 
Union.
